tool_description: Continuous game screen monitoring with automated vision analysis every 10 seconds

available_commands.description: Get current monitoring status and statistics
Force immediate screenshot capture and analysis

tool_usage_guidance: Automatic monitoring mode - captures and analyzes screen every 10 seconds
No manual commands needed - game state injected automatically into context
Use get_status to check monitoring statistics
Use capture_now to force immediate analysis outside regular interval
HIGH priority updates ensure game context is always available
Analysis includes: game identification, player status, objectives, threats, UI elements
Works with any game - provides generic game state description
Requires Ollama running with vision model (llava:latest or similar)
proactive_triggers: Automatically every 10 seconds during active gameplay
Provides continuous awareness of game state
No specific triggers needed - always monitoring when enabled

metadata.notes: Continuous monitoring tool - captures primary monitor every 10 seconds. Requires Ollama with vision model. Analysis results automatically injected into thought buffer with HIGH priority.
